message:
I have successfully reset the custom configurations in /etc/:

1. /etc/environment: Restored to default PATH variable, removing custom OH_INTERPRETER_PATH
2. /etc/hosts: Removed custom entry for "the-agent-company.com" while maintaining standard localhost and IPv6 configurations
3. /etc/shells: Removed non-standard shell entry (tmux) while keeping standard shell paths

Note: I did not modify:
- /etc/resolv.conf: It's already using Docker's default configuration
- /etc/hostname: The current hostname "vultr" appears to be the system's assigned hostname
- /etc/ld.so.cache: This is a system-generated binary cache file that gets updated automatically

All configurations have been reset to their default values where custom modifications were found.
